title: Burak's Blog
description: Welcome to Burak's blog, where I share my thoughts and experiences on technology, web development, QA testing, minimalism, and GNU/Linux. I have a passion for all things tech and I love to share my knowledge with others. Whether you're a beginner or an expert, I hope you'll find something of value here. My goal is to provide helpful tips, tutorials, and insights on these topics, so you can continue to learn and grow in your own journey. Join me as we explore the world of technology and keep up with the latest trends and advancements.
